@tj007razor wrote:

Well I’m sure you dont need it, because most servers just have this

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 1); hitDiff = misc.random(2); //Damage }
and, Why can’t you just use that by the way.?

item.title: What's wrong with Wind Strike?
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

MisterZ, still logs me out, but I don’t have comp. errors.

thiefmn6092:

Logs you out? Perhaps there is an unhandled exception somewhere?

Starting Scape on 0.0.0.0:43594 config\objects.cfg: file not found. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2376 Client type: low memory version UserId: 76238892 Scape is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1152 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-Scape]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1152 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-Scape]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1152 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-Scape]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1160 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1152 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-Scape]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [client-1-Scape]: npcIndex: 432 magicID: 1152 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-Scape]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 Game saved for player Scape ClientHandler: Client Scape disconnected. Npc id =432

item.title: What's wrong with Wind Strike?
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Try this:

if (magicID == 1152 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { // Wind Strike ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 2, 1, 566, 558, 1, 1); stillgfx(453, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(5); attackNPCSWithin(EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0); attackPlayersWithin(453, 30, 4); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[6]), 6); }

If it works modify it to your likings…

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong with Wind Strike?
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Well I have no idea my source is set up differently and I havn’t ever worked with Magic before… Never had a problem or noticed anyone else with this problem. Here’s what’s declared for my wind strike spell using the Projectilespell method in my source. I’m not sure if it works.

ProjectileSpell(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 1);

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong with Wind Strike?
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

wtf, Is wrong with this? Whenever I use the Wind Strike on an NPC, it always logs me out… ;l

if (magicID == 1152 && playerLevel[6] >= 1 && (playerHasItem(556) == true && playerHasItem(558) == true)){ //Wind Strike by GoldenShard stillgfx(90, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[6]), 6); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1); deleteItem(558, getItemSlot(558), 1); startAnimation(1818); attackNPCSWithin(EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 0); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(5); } else if (playerHasItem(556) == false && playerHasItem(558) == false){ sendMessage("Sorry you need 1 Mind and 1 Air Rune to do this spell."); }

Read full topic
